input.description: HIC Kitchen Roasting Meat Thermometer instantly reads internal temperatures to cook meat properly and keep it juicy while roasting to a golden brown outside. Made from stainless steel with a large shatterproof face and BPA-free plastic protective cover, it provides accurate readings between 20 and 220-degrees Fahrenheit in as few as 5-10 seconds. The oversized analog dial allows for clear, easy-to-read temperature checks at a glance, while the protective sheath is imprinted with a cooking temperature chart for beef, poultry, pork, lamb, and game. Temperatures are displayed in both Fahrenheit and Celsius for universal reference. Compact and easy to store, this instant-read thermometer includes a recalibration function built into the protective sheath to help maintain accuracy without requiring a wrench. To use, simply insert the pointed probe at least 1.5-inches into the thickest part of the meat without touching the bone and wait until the pointer stops moving. Perfect for roasting, grilling, smoking, rotisserie, and campfire cooking, it ensures meats reach proper internal temperatures for safe and flavorful results. The thermometer is dishwasher safe and includes instructions for use and recalibration. Do not use in the oven or subject to extreme temperature changes. Brought to you by HIC, a third-generation family owned and operated company in the USA since 1957.
